name: something else
content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><scxml     datamodel="ecmascript"    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml"    version="1.0">    <datamodel>        <data id="myArray" expr="[1,3,5,7,9]"/>        <data id="myItem" expr="0"/>        <data id="myIndex" expr="0"/>        <data id="sum" expr="0"/>        <data id="indexSum" expr="0"/>    </datamodel>    <state id="a">        <onentry>            <log label="before" expr="[sum,indexSum]"/>            <foreach array="myArray" item="myItem" index="myIndex">                <assign location="sum" expr="sum + myItem"/>                <assign location="indexSum" expr="indexSum + myIndex"/>            </foreach>            <foreach array="myArray" item="myItem">                <assign location="sum" expr="sum + myItem"/>            </foreach>            <log label="after" expr="[sum,indexSum]"/>        </onentry>        <transition target="c" event="t" cond="sum === 50 &amp;&amp; indexSum === 10"/>    </state>    <state id="c"/></scxml>
